name: Yui Mizuno
description: {{nihongo|'''Yui Mizuno'''|水野 由結|Mizuno Yui|born June 20, 1999}}, better known as '''Yuimetal''', is a Japanese singer and dancer. She is a former member of the [[kawaii metal]] group [[Babymetal]] and the [[Japanese idol|idol]] group [[Sakura Gakuin]]. After being absent since December 2017, Mizuno officially left Babymetal due to undisclosed health issues in October 2018. She is managed by the Amuse Inc. talent agency.
